    target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC CAIRO_WIN32_STATIC_BUILD)
    target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE /wd4244 /wd4146 /wd4305 /wd4267 /wd4311 /wd4996 /wd4334)
